name: Generate-a-Date
description:
Generate-a-Date is a short form, text-based dating simulator  where every date is designed to be totally unique.

The objective of the game is to on silly speed dates with randomly generated partners where you read them poems, learn about their lives, and decide whether or not you want to commit to them (and, if so, what your future lives will be like together!).

Generate-a-Date was originally made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 105: Dreamy, but will likely receive updates post-jam, because it was extremely fun to put together.
